Title: Everybody Bleeds
Writer: Nick Kroll (created by), Andrew Goldberg (created by), Mark Levin (created by), Jennifer Flackett (created by), Kelly Galuska
Actors: Fred Armisen, Neil Casey, Jessica Chaffin, John Gemberling
Plot: A field trip goes from awkward to mortifying as Jessi navigates the demands of coupledom and gets her first period -- inside the Statue of Liberty.
